title: OT122: Openne Thread
summary:
Key ideas:
- This is an open thread where readers can post about anything they want
- Political and social topics should be avoided
- A new comment system displays comments newest-first in open threads

Key learnings:
- There have been changes made to the blog's administrative tasks
- The author thanks readers for reporting inappropriate comments
- The author bans bad actors on a weekly basis

Key questions:
- None mentioned
